-----------------

These amino acids code for genes related to factors that cause virulence in bacteria. One of these factors is the type-3 secretion system, which involves a probe to detect cells of other organisms, then infect them. The other amino acids code for genes involved in antigen proteins, which are also involved with infecting other cells.
